newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka stocks seen recovering from recent falls.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka stocks seen recovering from recent falls.

text.p: Shares on the Dhaka Stock Exchange (DSE) are likely to stage a mild recovery on Saturday after last week's falls, brokers said.
"A modest correction during the last week is most likely to bring back investors. Prices are now very attractive," said broker Moshtaque Ahmed.
Another broker said small investors might watch the market after recent threats by the opposition Bangladesh Nationalist Party to launch anti-government agitation.
The benchmark index of the Dhaka Stock Exchange fell 17.75 points, or percent, to 1,702.49 on Thursday.
